name: Cryptocerus
description: The Cryptocerus frame is named for the wood-roach of Cradle, and is as durable as its namesake.

traits.name: Guardian
traits.description: Allied characters can use the Cryptocerus as Hard Cover

traits.name: Active Terrain Shielding
traits.description: The Cryptocerus cannot gain Hard Cover from terrain. When it would otherwise be eligible for Hard Cover from an Attack it gains Resistance against all Damage from the Attack and the terrain that would grant Cover also takes the full Damage of the attack.

core_system.name: Cradelization Engine
core_system.description: Releasing a massive quantity of construction nanites, the Cryptocerus can manipulate the battlefield to its advantage
core_system.active_effect: As a Protocol the Cryptocerus can move any two pieces of size 1 terrain, or one piece of size 2 terrain 4 spaces. After activating this Protocol it can be activated for the remainder of the scene without CP cost.

name: Geminata
description: The Geminata is designed to evade and eliminate native flora and fauna analogues in preparation for cradelization.

traits.name: All Terrain
traits.description: The Gemata ignores the movement penalty for Difficult Terrain, and gains 1 Accuracy on Engineering Checks to avoid damage from Dangerous Terrain.

core_system.name: Exoadaptive Camouflage
core_system.passive_effect: While in Difficult or Dangerous Terrain, this mech gains Soft Cover.
core_system.active_effect: For the remainder of the scene, the first time each turn the Geminata enters Difficult or Dangerous Terrain it gains Hidden even if Engaged.
